title: Example showcase
text: binance_spot() constructor Binance Spot API. returns R6 object class BinanceSpot contains methods Binance Spot API. information please refer Binance Spot API docs.
code: spot <- binance_spot()  spot$test_connectivity() spot$check_server_time() spot$get_exchange_info() spot$order_book("BNBUSDT", limit = 20) spot$recent_trades_list("BTCUSDT") spot$old_trade_lookup("BTCUSDT") spot$aggregate_trades_list("BTCUSDT") spot$kline("BTCUSDT", "1m", limit = 10) spot$get_ui_kline_data("BTCUSDT", "1m", limit = 10) spot$get_current_avg_price("BTCUSDT") spot$ticker_stats_24hr("BTCUSDT") spot$trading_day_ticker(c("BTCUSDT", "ETHUSDT")) spot$price_ticker(c("BTCUSDT", "ETHUSDT")) spot$order_book_ticker(c("BTCUSDT", "ETHUSDT")) spot$price_change_stats(c("BTCUSDT", "ETHUSDT"))

title: Example showcase
text: binance_futures_usdt_m() constructor Binance USDT-M Futures API. returns R6 object class BinanceFuturesUSDTM contains methods Binance USDT-M Futures API. information please refer Binance USDT-M Futures API docs.
code: futures_usdt_m <- binance_futures_usdt_m()  futures_usdt_m$test_connectivity() futures_usdt_m$check_server_time() futures_usdt_m$get_exchange_info() futures_usdt_m$order_book("BNBUSDT", limit = 5) futures_usdt_m$recent_trades_list("BTCUSDT") futures_usdt_m$old_trade_lookup("BTCUSDT") # error, need auth futures_usdt_m$kline("BTCUSDT", "1m", limit = 10) futures_usdt_m$ticker_stats_24hr("BTCUSDT") futures_usdt_m$price_ticker(c("BTCUSDT", "ETHUSDT")) futures_usdt_m$aggregate_trades("BTCUSDT") futures_usdt_m$continuous_kline("BTCUSDT", "PERPETUAL", "1d") futures_usdt_m$index_price_klines("BTCUSDT", "1d") futures_usdt_m$mark_price_klines("BTCUSDT", "1d") futures_usdt_m$premium_index_klines("BTCUSDT", "1d") futures_usdt_m$mark_price("BTCUSDT") futures_usdt_m$funding_rate_history("BTCUSDT") futures_usdt_m$funding_info() futures_usdt_m$price_ticker_v2("BTCUSDT") futures_usdt_m$order_book_ticker("BTCUSDT") futures_usdt_m$open_interest("BTCUSDT") futures_usdt_m$quarterly_settlement_price("BTCUSDT") futures_usdt_m$open_interest_stats("BTCUSDT", "5m") futures_usdt_m$top_ls_ratio_accounts("BTCUSDT", "5m") futures_usdt_m$top_ls_ratio_positions("BTCUSDT", "5m") futures_usdt_m$ls_ratio("BTCUSDT", "5m") futures_usdt_m$taker_buy_sell_volume("BTCUSDT", "5m") futures_usdt_m$basis("BTCUSDT", "PERPETUAL", "5m") futures_usdt_m$bltv_kline("BTCUP", "5m") futures_usdt_m$composite_index_info("NFTUSDT") futures_usdt_m$multi_asset_index("BTCUSDT") futures_usdt_m$index_constituents("BTCUSDT")

title: Example showcase
text: binance_futures_coin_m() constructor Binance Coin-M Futures API. returns R6 object class BinanceFuturesCoinM contains methods Binance Coin-M Futures API. information please refer Binance Coin-M Futures API docs.
code: futures_coin_m <- binance_futures_coin_m()  futures_coin_m$test_connectivity() futures_coin_m$check_server_time() futures_coin_m$get_exchange_info() futures_coin_m$order_book("BNBUSD_PERP", limit = 5) futures_coin_m$recent_trades_list("BTCUSD_PERP") futures_coin_m$old_trade_lookup("BTCUSD_PERP") # error, need auth futures_coin_m$kline("BTCUSD_PERP", "1m", limit = 10) futures_coin_m$ticker_stats_24hr("BTCUSD_PERP") futures_coin_m$price_ticker(c("BTCUSDT", "ETHUSDT")) futures_coin_m$aggregate_trades("BTCUSD_PERP") futures_coin_m$index_and_mark_price("BTCUSD_PERP") futures_coin_m$funding_rate("BTCUSD_PERP") futures_coin_m$continuous_kline("BTCUSD", "PERPETUAL", "1d") futures_coin_m$index_price_klines("BTCUSD", "1d") futures_coin_m$mark_price_klines("BTCUSD_PERP", "1d") futures_coin_m$premium_index_klines("BTCUSD_PERP", "1d") futures_coin_m$order_book_ticker("BTCUSD_PERP") futures_coin_m$index_constituents("BTCUSD") futures_coin_m$open_interest("BTCUSD_PERP") futures_coin_m$quarterly_settlement_price("BTCUSD") futures_coin_m$open_interest_stats("BTCUSD", "PERPETUAL", "5m") futures_coin_m$top_ls_ratio_accounts("BTCUSD", "5m") futures_coin_m$top_ls_ratio_positions("BTCUSD", "1d") futures_coin_m$ls_ratio("BTCUSD", "5m") futures_coin_m$taker_buy_sell_volume("BTCUSD", "PERPETUAL", "5m") futures_coin_m$basis("BTCUSD", "PERPETUAL", "5m")

title: Example showcase
text: binance_options() constructor Binance European Options API. returns R6 object class BinanceOptions contains methods Binance European Options API. information please refer Binance European Options API docs.
code: options <- binance_options()  options$test_connectivity() options$check_server_time() options$get_exchange_info() options$order_book("BTC-241227-100000-C", limit = 10) options$recent_trades_list("BTC-241227-100000-C") options$old_trade_lookup("BTC-241227-100000-C") options$kline("BTC-241227-100000-C", "1d", limit = 10) options$ticker_stats_24hr("BTC-241227-100000-C") options$price_ticker("BTCUSDT") options$mark_price("BTC-241227-100000-C") options$excerise_records() options$open_interest("BTC", "241227")

title: Getting Started with binance
text: binance interface Binance REST APIs R using httr2 package tidyverse styling. supports connecting sending requests : Binance Spot Exchange Binance USDT-M Futures Exchange Binance Coin-M Futures Exchange Binance European Options Exchange

title: Authors and Citation
text: Vedha Viyash. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Viyash V (2024). binance: R Interface 'Binance' REST APIs. R package version 0.0.0.9000,  https://github.com/vedhav/binance, https://vedhav.github.io/binance/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {binance: R Interface to the `Binance` REST APIs},   author = {Vedha Viyash},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000,  https://github.com/vedhav/binance},   url = {https://vedhav.github.io/binance/}, }

what: R Interface to the `Binance` REST APIs
title: R Interface to the `Binance` REST APIs
text: R interface Binance REST API endpoints Spot, Futures, Options. binance interface Binance REST APIs R using httr2 package tidyverse styling. supports connecting sending requests : Binance Spot Exchange Binance USDT-M Futures Exchange Binance Coin-M Futures Exchange Binance European Options Exchange

title: R Interface to the `Binance` REST APIs
R Interface to the `Binance` REST APIs
code: library(binance) spot <- binance_spot() futures_usdt_m <- binance_futures_usdt_m() futures_coin_m <- binance_futures_coin_m() options <- binance_options()  spot$test_connectivity() #> SUCCESS [2024-03-04 07:48:25] Connection is successful. futures_usdt_m$test_connectivity() #> SUCCESS [2024-03-04 07:48:27] Connection is successful. futures_coin_m$test_connectivity() #> SUCCESS [2024-03-04 07:48:29] Connection is successful. options$test_connectivity() #> SUCCESS [2024-03-04 07:48:31] Connection is successful.

title: Binance Constructor — Binance
text: Class encapsulates core API methods communicate Binance API.

title: Binance Constructor — Binance
text: Binance$new() Binance$print() Binance$sign_in() Binance$test_connectivity() Binance$check_server_time() Binance$get_exchange_info() Binance$order_book() Binance$recent_trades_list() Binance$old_trade_lookup() Binance$kline() Binance$ticker_stats_24hr() Binance$price_ticker() Binance$clone()

text: profile (string) name configuration read API configurations. Print method Print high level information object.

title: Binance Constructor — Binance
text: ... additional arguments print Setup API Key Secret Providing object Binance API key Secret perform authenticated requests.

title: Binance Constructor — Binance
text: api_key (string) Binance API key. taken environment variable BINANCE_API_KEY provided. api_secret (string) Binance API secret. taken environment variable BINANCE_API_SECRET provided. Test Connectivity Test connectivity Rest API logging connection status.

title: Binance Constructor — Binance
text: httr2 response object. Check Server Time Test connectivity Rest API get current server time.

title: Binance Constructor — Binance
text: POSIXct object server time. Exchange Information Current exchange trading rules symbol information

title: Binance Constructor — Binance
text: tibble exchange information. Order Book Get order book given symbol.

title: Binance Constructor — Binance
text: symbol (string) trading symbol. limit (integer) number orders return. Default 100; max 5000. limit > 5000, response truncate 5000.

title: Binance Constructor — Binance
text: list last update id, bids, asks. Recent Trades List Get recent trades given symbol.

title: Binance Constructor — Binance
text: symbol (string) trading symbol. limit (integer) number trades return. Default 500; max 1000. Old Trade Lookup Get older market trades given symbol.

title: Binance Constructor — Binance
text: symbol (string) trading symbol. limit (integer) number trades return. Default 500; max 1000. from_id (integer) trade id fetch . Default gets recent trades. Kline/Candlestick Data Kline/candlestick bars symbol. Klines uniquely identified open time.

title: Binance Constructor — Binance
code: Binance$kline(   symbol,   interval,   start_time = NULL,   end_time = NULL,   time_zone = "0",   limit = 500 )

title: Binance Constructor — Binance
text: symbol (string) trading symbol. interval (string) interval kline/candlestick bars. Valid values: 1s,1m,3m,5m,15m,30m,1h,2h,4h,6h,8h,12h,1d,3d,1w, 1M : s-> seconds; m -> minutes; h -> hours; d -> days; w -> weeks; M -> months start_time (numeric) start time klines epoch milliseconds. end_time (numeric) end time klines epoch milliseconds. time_zone (string) time zone use start end time. Default "0" (UTC). limit (integer) number klines return. Default 500; max 1000.

text: tibble kline data. 24hr Ticker Price Change Statistics 24 hour rolling window price change statistics. Careful accessing symbol.

title: Binance Spot Class — BinanceSpot
text: (tibble) tibble price ticker data. Rolling window price change statistics Note: method different ticker_stats_24hr method. window used compute statistics 59999ms requested windowSize. openTime method always starts minute, closeTime current time request. , effective window 59999ms wider windowSize. E.g. closeTime 1641287867099 (January 04, 2022 09:17:47:099 UTC), windowSize 1d. openTime : 1641201420000 (January 3, 2022, 09:17:00 UTC)

title: Binance Spot Class — BinanceSpot
text: symbols (character) trading symbols. window_size (character) window size statistics. Default "1d". Supported windowSize values: 1m,2m....59m minutes 1h, 2h....23h - hours 1d...7d - days Units combined (e.g. 1d2h allowed). type (character) type statistics. Default "FULL"; Supported values "FULL" "MINI".
